basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli L361 (MIC=10 µM), Pseudomonas fluorescens (MIC=50 µM), Salmonella Salford (MIC>50 µM), Escherichia coli O:9 (MIC=15 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus cereus (MIC=20 µM), Listeria monocytogenes (MIC=10 µM), Staphylococcus aureus (MIC>50 µM).
